channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: I tested the Canon EOS R6 Mark III — it's a near-perfect hybrid camera, with one major drawback
item.description: The Canon EOS R6 Mark III takes the fight to Sony and Nikon with an impressive range of upgrades for both video and stills.

item.title: I've already played Star Wars Outlaws on PS5, but Gold Edition makes it worth revisiting on Nintendo Switch 2
item.description: Star Wars Outlaws is a must-play game for fans of the galaxy far, far away and it holds up impressively well in its Gold Edition release for Nintendo Switch 2.
